pages.text: A $(item)Trial Key$() is an item that can be obtained from a $(l:rare/trial_spawner)$(item)Trial Spawner$() and used to unlock standard $(l:rare/vault)$(item)Vaults$(). $(br2)Using a key on vaults unlocks it, causing it to eject items and the key to be consumed.

An $(item)Ominous Trial Key$() is a rarer variant of the normal key. $(br2)It can be obtained from an $(l:rare/trial_spawner)$(item)Ominous Trial Spawner$(). $(br)It is used to unlock an $(l:rare/vault)$(item)Ominous Vault$().
